New Records: Jasson Domínguez became the youngest Yankees player to homer in his first career game
Jasson Domínguez is the youngest position player to appear in a game for the Yankees since 1984
Key Match Events: Jasson Domínguez hit a two-run home run off Houston ace Justin Verlander in his first major league at-bat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Domínguez finished 1 for 4 as the Yankees won 6-2
Austin Wells also made his debut and singled off Verlander
